text: 8. The second part of our Interim Report was devoted to anaesthetists who become addicted to the gases and vapours which they use in the course of their professional duties. We ascertained that the incidence of this irregularity was very small indeed. However, over a period of eleven years, patients' lives had been endangered in two known instances.
handwritten_text: 8. The second part of our Interim Report was devoted to anaesthetists who become addicted to the gases and vapours which they use in the course of their professional duties. We ascertained that the incidence of this irregularity was very small indeed. However, over a period of eleven years, patients' lives had been endangered in two known instances.
